meta.title: Arclet Copier - Quick URL Copy Chrome Extension
meta.description: A clean and efficient Chrome extension for quick URL copying with smart parameter filtering, Markdown format, short URL generation, and QR code generation.

hero.title: Quick URL Copy
hero.subtitle: Clean & Efficient Chrome Extension
hero.description: Copy current page URL with one click. Supports parameter filtering, Markdown format, short URL generation, and QR code generation. Boost your productivity.

items.title: One-Click URL Copy
items.description: Support popup click and hotkey silent copy for quick and easy operation

items.title: Smart Parameter Cleaning
items.description: Three-level cleaning modes, intelligently identify and remove tracking parameters

items.title: Markdown Format
items.description: Support copying as [Title](URL) format Markdown links

items.title: Short URL Generation
items.description: Generate and copy short URLs with one click, supports is.gd and TinyURL services

items.title: QR Code Generation
items.description: Generate QR codes for current page URLs, support copying QR code images

items.title: Dark Theme
items.description: Complete dark theme support, can follow system or manual switching

items.title: Multi-Theme Color System
items.description: 5 theme colors available, interface elements and notification colors follow theme

items.title: Multi-Language Support
items.description: Support 9 languages including Chinese, English, Spanish, Japanese, etc.

download.title: Download Now
download.subtitle: Free to use, open source and trustworthy
download.chrome_store_desc: Install from official store, safe and reliable
download.github_release_desc: Download source package, manually install latest version
install_steps: Install from Chrome Web Store or download source package
Open Chrome extension management page chrome://extensions/
If using source package, enable developer mode and load unpacked extension

footer.description: Arclet Copier is an open source Chrome extension
